page.title: 04LOCAL CLUBS
page.content: A keep-fit club is held every Monday in Sheriffhales Church Hall. The Brownies also meet there every Friday evening ;as do the Youth Club every Thursday night. There is Womans Institute within the village. People from this area belong to the National Farmers Union, The Young Farmers Club, The Telford United Junior Supporters Club,(soccer),Shifnal Tennis Club, Shifnal Golf Club, Shifnal & Lilleshall Squash Clubs and Newport Gymnastics Club.There is also a Parochial Church Council in Sheriffhales.
